item.description: As is our tradition, we will provide volunteer coverage for the National Association of Letter Carriers annual food drive, this year at the Shield Street Post Office in West Hartford. One or two people are needed to arrive at 1:00, others could arrive in 2:00 - 3:00 range. Plan to work until 5:00 or 6:00 PM and then we will go out for a casual meal. You will be lifting and packing food donations and working outdoors, so please come dressed for the weather and to work! in your RSVP let us know if you will be coming at noon or later.
item.name: Food drive volunteers
